content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

choices.label: It prints 0 if x is even and prints -1 otherwise.
It prints -1 if x is even and prints 0 otherwise.
It prints true if x is even and prints false otherwise.
It prints false if x is even and prints true otherwise.

content.answer: It prints true if x is even and prints false otherwise.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
